morphInfos.tenseExplained: it will happen in the future
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person speaking or writing
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that will happen – by a person or thing that is speaking or writing
